Name: Food Bomber
About the game: Nightmare takes control of the old villa because some unexpected guests are coming into the kitchen tonight. These strange and beautiful masters of nightmare want to control the kitchen and all the tasty foods. Let's have a party with them! Show your power and use tomato bombs to beat them back. Meanwhile, enemies' foods are dangerous, as well. You have to move flexibly to dodge the foods and hold on as far as possible. Game Characteristics: It is a flight shooting game with a bit strange and horror elements. You can use the flame jet to clean up foods flying here and there and use tomato bombs to defeat the strong enemies. Only after entirely defeating a master can you get healing from delicious food. Each master has several battle shapes of different power. New masters will join in soon.
